sentence.Network_en: He snorted and pranced and pawed at the floor in salivating lust and groveling need.
sentence.Network_cn: 他叽叽咕咕,摇头晃脑,两脚还在地上乱跺乱蹬,一副垂涎欲滴,苦苦哀告的样子.

sentence.Network_en: A request like yours requires flattery and groveling.
sentence.Network_cn: 一个要求式的邀请恭维和卑躬屈节.

sentence.Network_en: You must know how an ant feels, groveling like that.
sentence.Network_cn: 你要知道蚂蚁如何感受当你那样爬行.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(G) -亿城英语 ... groveler 五体投地 groveling 匍匐的 grow downwards 缩小.

list.abs: He said he would never grovel before a conqueror ., 他说他永远不会在征服者脚下摇尾乞怜.
The frightened slaves groveled at the feet of their cruel master ., 那些吓坏了的奴隶匍匐在残暴的主人脚下.
grovelling around under the table looking for a pin ., 在桌子下爬来爬去寻找一根针.
flatter fawn cringe 畏缩，谄媚grovel adulate （程度最深）几组形近词

auth_sentence.content: "One of Michaels's rules was, no groveling to the audience either in the studio or at home," Shales and Miller write.
auth_sentence.res_content: "One of Michaels's rules was, no groveling to the audience either in the studio or at home," Shales and Miller write.
